turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order a drink for me at one of the nearby coffee shops.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Indianapolis. I see a Peets and a Starbucks nearby. Which is better?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks if I had to say so. What would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not too hot on coffee as is but these places are the closest and open. What do you recommend?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You might like the Blonde Black and White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's fairly sweet. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have their own size metrics. What milk would you like in it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, coconut, non-fat, whole, 2%, and soy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I've placed an order for a venti Blonde Black and White Mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream at the Starbucks nearest your location. You should see the receipt momentarily on your phone. Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be all. Thank you. Goodbye.
